SELECT c.PLYNO AS plyNo, c.INS_ST AS insStartDate, c.INS_CLSTR AS insEndDate, c.AN_PY_STDT AS annuityDate,
c.GDCD AS productCode, c.RATE_CODE AS rateCode, c.PR_BZCS_DSCNO AS expenseKey,
c.RL_PYM_TRM AS payYears, c.DFR_TRM AS deferYears, c.AN_PY_TRM AS annuityTerm,
c.EXPCT_INRT AS expectedInterest, c.PR_NWCRT_TAMT AS deductible, c.CRFW_PR_NWCRT_TAMT AS carryForwardDeductible,
c.PYM_CYCCD AS pymCyccd, c.AN_INS_TRM_FLGCD AS annInsTrmFlgcd, c.AN_PYTCD AS annPytcd, c.AN_PY_GIRT AS annPyGirt,
d.DEPOSIT_SEQ AS depositSeq, d.DEPOSIT_DATE AS depositDate, d.PRINCIPAL AS principal
FROM CONTRACT c JOIN DEPOSIT d ON d.PLYNO = c.PLYNO
WHERE (#{runMode} = 'ALL' OR c.PLYNO = #{targetPlyNo})
ORDER BY c.PLYNO, d.DEPOSIT_SEQ
SELECT * FROM STEP1_SUMMARY WHERE (#{runMode} = 'ALL' OR PLYNO = #{targetPlyNo}) ORDER BY PLYNO
SELECT * FROM STEP2_SUMMARY WHERE (#{runMode} = 'ALL' OR PLYNO = #{targetPlyNo}) ORDER BY PLYNO
